bibl.title: Family History in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: POMEROY, Sarah B.

bibl.note: Discusses the picture of the family painted by official government records, and compares it to the portrait that emerges simultaneously from private documents. A longer, fully annotated version is to be published under the title: The Family in Classical and Hellenistic Greece.
POMEROY Sarah B., Family History in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 593-597.
